title: 1975–76 Alpha Ethniki
text:
The 1975–76 <a href="Superleague%20Greece">Alpha Ethniki</a> was the 40th season of the highest <a href="Association%20football">football</a> league of Greece. The season began on 5 October 1975 and ended on 23 May 1976. <a href="PAOK%20FC">PAOK</a> won their first Greek title in its history.
The point system was: "Win: 2 points" - "Draw: 1 point".
League table.
